name: Aimee Demo
description:
Aimee is a brainiac who spends way too much time playing video games. In a sudden twist of fate, however, she ends up being transported to a strange building where she must solve twisted puzzles in order to stay alive. The only aid is a strange woman claiming to be the puzzlemaster who communicates via phone. 

This is my RPGMaker Game Jam submission. 

Controls: 

Z - Select

X - Bring up menu/Cancel
